Experiment planning

Function for simulating a binding curve while planning an experiment

plan_experiment

Plan a binding assay experiment

Inspection of raw data

Function for inspecting raw data, finding outliers

fret_inspect_raw_data

Inspect raw fluorescence data from FRET binding assays

fret_inspect_one_dataset

Inspect raw fluorescence data from a single FRET binding assay

fret_save_inspection_plots

Save raw data plots from a single FRET binding dataset

Data processing

Functions for processing raw data

fret_format_data

Format raw experimental FRET binding data for subsequent processing

fret_format_one_dataset

Format a single dataframe for subsequent processing

fret_average_replicates

Average technical replicates from a FRET experiment

fret_correct_signal

Correct FRET signal

fret_correct_one_dataset

Correct FRET signal for one experiment

Curve fitting

Functions for fitting experimental data and making a final figure

guess_parameters

Guess initial values for parameters of the binding model equations

fit_binding_model

Fit a binding model equation to the experimental binding data

make_figure

Make a figure with experimental data and fitted binding curve

make_one_figure

Make a figure with data and binding curve from a single experiment

detect_binding_model

Detect which binding model equation was used to fit a dataset

Equations

Definitions of binding model equations

hyperbolic

Hyperbolic model equation

hill

Hill model equation

quadratic

Quadratic model equation
